summary: This script creates a virtual X server (xvfb), prepares it for use, and runs an xterm within it. The comment explains the purpose of the code in brief: "Creates X virtual framebuffer and starts an xterm session within it."

details.comment: This script creates a virtual X server (xvfb), prepares it for use, and runs an xterm within it. The comment explains the purpose of the code in brief: "Creates X virtual framebuffer and starts an xterm session within it."
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
rm -rf /dev/shm/xvfb
mkdir /dev/shm/xvfb
xvfb-run -f ~/.Xauthority -n 1 -s "-pixdepths 3 27 -fbdir /dev/shm/xvfb" xterm
#xvfb-run -f ~/.Xauthority -n 1 -s "-pixdepths 3 27 -fbdir /dev/shm/xvfb -listen tcp " xterm
